umm.. I just gave this a go and I am having the same problem as with v5.3!! I get the RXP logo covering the gauge and cannot remove them!!
I had the same issues with 5.3 but this 1 worked....make sure the RXPsvr.dll in the modules folder is not the 5.3 version
It's not.. it says it's ver 5.2.1!

@ scooby

The only thing I can suggest is to eliminate all traces of any previous installs.Uninstall the T & N through the add/remove programs.

Go to the c182 /panel folder & get rid on any panel cfg files & go back to the default. Get rid of any modules. Delete the RXP file in fs9 & also the 1 on the c drive.

Run a registry cleaner.
